page.topic: Sending Filter and Order Expressions to a Page

section.description: If you want to send multiple arguments to a page, you must separate them with "&" characters. This example duplicates and modifies the Pick_a_Customer page to create the Apply_Filter_and_Order page.

step.description: Display the Web Project Control Panel.
Select and right click the "Pick_a_Customer" web component.
Select Duplicate. Enter "Apply_Filter_and_Order" and click Duplicate.
Select and right click the "Pick_a_Customer" A5W page.
Select Duplicate. Enter "Apply_Filter_and_Order" and click Duplicate.
Select the "Apply_Filter_and_Order" web component and click Edit.
Display the Grid Fields page.
Select "" in the Selected Fields list.
In the Link Properties > Link Address field click to display the Link Address Builder.
Enter the following Link Address and click OK.
step.note: Remove the space characters from the finished URL.

step.description: Click Save and Close.

section.title: Creating the Apply_Filter_and_Order Page
section.description: The first step in creating the new page is to remove the previous component.

step.description: Display the Web Project Control Panel.
Edit the "Apply_Filter_and_Order" page.
Display the WYSIWYG tab of the HTML Editor.
Select the components on the page and click Delete.
Click 'save' and Yes.
Place the cursor where you want to insert the new grid component and click Insert Component.
Click Select to display the Select Component dialog.
Select the "Apply_Filter_and_Order" web component and click OK.
Click OK, then save and close the HTML Editor.
In the Web Project Control Panel. right click on the "Apply_Filter_and_Order" page and select Publish (Local Webroot) and open.
